summary: Provides fast unit tests for the Stable Diffusion image‑to‑image pipeline with Plug‑and‑Play (PAG) support, using lightweight dummy components and inputs to verify PAG enable/disable behavior and basic inference functionality.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and stability of the PAG‑enhanced Stable Diffusion pipeline during development, enabling rapid detection of regressions and ensuring reliable image generation for downstream applications.
